title: Reconstruction will be subject to an agreement executed by at least 70 per cent of the landlord and occupants each in the original building, within the meaning of the Mumbai Rents, Hotel and Lodging House Rates Control Act, 1947, and such agreement shall make a provision for accommodation and re- accommodate the said landlord/all occupants in the new building on agreed terms and a certificate from a practicing advocate having minimum of 10 years’ experience, is submitted confirming that on the date of application, reconstruction, agreements are executed by at least 70% of the landlords and occupants each in the original building with the developer/owner
clause_text: Reconstruction will be subject to an agreement executed by at least 70 per cent of the landlord and occupants each in the original building, within the meaning of the Mumbai Rents, Hotel and Lodging House Rates Control Act, 1947, and such agreement shall make a provision for accommodation and re- accommodate the said landlord/all occupants in the new building on agreed terms and a certificate from a practicing advocate having minimum of 10 years’ experience, is submitted confirming that on the date of application, reconstruction, agreements are executed by at least 70% of the landlords and occupants each in the original building with the developer/owner. The Advocate shall also certify that the agreements with occupants are valid and subsisting on the date of application.
section: 33(6) Reconstruction of buildings destroyed by fire or which have collapsed or which have been demolished under lawful order
